feed.title: suyunlei
feed.subtitle: An engaging 1-3 sentence description of your lab.

entry.title: UGOD Summer AI Symposium
entry.content: Join us at the UGOD Summer AI Symposium on July 9, 2025, at HKUST (Guangzhou). With the theme “Intersecting Futures: Human - Centered AI for Smart Cities,” professors from UGOD and other thrusts will give presentations on topics including Urban Computing and Cognition, Urban Mapping, Modeling and Visualization, Urban Design and Planning, and AI in Urban Systems.More details
entry.summary: Join us at the UGOD Summer AI Symposium on July 9, 2025, at HKUST (Guangzhou). With the theme “Intersecting Futures: Human - Centered AI for Smart Cities,” professors from UGOD and other thrusts will give presentations on topics including Urban Computing and Cognition, Urban Mapping, Modeling and Visualization, Urban Design and Planning, and AI in Urban Systems.More details

entry.title: Semantic Understanding of Multi-modal Remote Sensing Data

link.title: Semantic Understanding of Multi-modal Remote Sensing Data

entry.content: We have recently initiated a special issue on “Semantic Understanding of Multi-modal Remote Sensing Data” in The Photogrammetric Engineering & Remote Sensing (PE&RS) on an invitation basis. We cordially invite esteemed researchers and scholars to submit high-quality manuscripts.
entry.summary: We have recently initiated a special issue on “Semantic Understanding of Multi-modal Remote Sensing Data” in The Photogrammetric Engineering & Remote Sensing (PE&RS) on an invitation basis. We cordially invite esteemed researchers and scholars to submit high-quality manuscripts.

entry.title: Welcome Prof. Dr. Alfred Stein
entry.content: It was a privilege to have Prof. Dr. Alfred Stein from Faculty of Geo-Information Science and Earth Observation (ITC) of the University of Twente, visit our campus and AI4DCity Lab!
entry.summary: It was a privilege to have Prof. Dr. Alfred Stein from Faculty of Geo-Information Science and Earth Observation (ITC) of the University of Twente, visit our campus and AI4DCity Lab!

entry.title: Welcome Prof. Filip Biljecki
entry.content: Pleased to have hosted Prof. Filip Biljecki and his PhD student Xiucheng Liang from NUS at HKUST Guangzhou for enlightening exchanges!
entry.summary: Pleased to have hosted Prof. Filip Biljecki and his PhD student Xiucheng Liang from NUS at HKUST Guangzhou for enlightening exchanges!

entry.title: Welcome Prof. Dr. Alfred Stein
entry.content: We’re organizing an session titled “Scan-to-BIM/CIM: Digital Innovations and Applications” for the ISDE-The 2nd Youth Innovation Forum on Digital Earth from December 4-7, 2024, in Hong Kong, China. We hope to see you there! For details and registration, visit the official website link.
entry.summary: We’re organizing an session titled “Scan-to-BIM/CIM: Digital Innovations and Applications” for the ISDE-The 2nd Youth Innovation Forum on Digital Earth from December 4-7, 2024, in Hong Kong, China. We hope to see you there! For details and registration, visit the official website link.
